questions.question: ) What is the capacity of the metal cylinder used while conducting the angularity number test?
What is the angularity number if the percentage of voids in the aggregate sample is 33?

What is the angularity number for the following sample whose relative density is 2.85, mass of cylinder is 1200 g, mass of cylinder filled with compacted aggregate is 5500 g and the mass of water required to fill the cylinder is 2600 g?

The following data is observed after performing the angularity test of aggregate : The volume of the cylinder is 3.5kg, the Specific gravity is 2.68, the weight of aggregate for sample 1 is 5.5 kg, for sample 2 is 5.4 kg and for sample 3 is 5.25 kg. What is the angularity number for the above-mentioned sample?
